Uses of Interface
lameonj.encoder.blade.BeConfig

  • Packages that use BeConfig 
    Package Description
    lameonj.encoder.blade
    Contains the object oriented Java wrappers of the C methods, structures and constants of the LAME Blade MP3 Encoder API.
    lameonj.impl.encoder.blade  

    • Uses of BeConfig in lameonj.encoder.blade

      Subinterfaces of BeConfig in lameonj.encoder.blade 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  BeConfigAAC
      The BeConfigAAC is the interface implemented by the BE_CONFIG internal class wrapper with the AAC mode.
      interface  BeConfigLHV1
      The BeConfigLHV1 is the interface implemented by the BE_CONFIG internal class wrapper with the LHV1 mode (LAME).
      interface  BeConfigMP3
      The BeConfigMP3 is the interface implemented by the BE_CONFIG internal class wrapper with the old MP3 mode.
      Methods in lameonj.encoder.blade that return BeConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BeConfig LAMEOnJBlade.newBeConfig()
      Creates a new generic configuration object.
      Methods in lameonj.encoder.blade with parameters of type BeConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void LAMEOnJBlade.encode(java.io.InputStream input, java.io.OutputStream mp3Output, BeConfig beConfig, boolean isWav)
      Encodes the input stream and writes the MP3 output to the specified output stream.
      void LAMEOnJBlade.encode(java.lang.String wavFile, java.lang.String mp3File, BeConfig beConfig)
      Encodes the input WAV file and writes the MP3 output to the specified file.
      BeStream LAMEOnJBlade.initStream(BeConfig beConfig)
      Creates (initializes) a new LAME encoding stream.
